chunks.lyrics: high). 4/4 time. Play with some distortion.
| = not a standard bar line; just used to separate music
x = percussive note with no pitch; muted note
. = staccato; mute the note immediately after striking it
b = bend string up to indicated pitch/fret
r = release bend to indicated string/fret
= artificial harmonic (use thumb to follow through the pick attack)
o / repeat sign (always look for these!)
= fret box; this is a C chord - this is the same as standard
tablature, only turned on its side. Tilt your head clockwise to read.
Suddenly you were gone from all the lives you left your mark upon.
how we talked and drank into the misty dawn. I hear the voices.
We ran by the water on the wet summer lawn. I see the footprints.
Tried to believe but you know it's no good.
This is something that just can't be understood.
the shouts of joy skiing fast through the woods. I hear the echoes.
I learned your love for life. I feel the way that you would. I feel your
